snippet: The Fish and Wildlife Service takes issue with an Op-Ed article, “The Wrong Way to Protect Elephants.”
abstract: Letter from Dan Ashe, director of the Fish and Wildlife Service, comments on Godfrey Harris and Daniel Stiles March 27 Op-Ed article on agency's decision to tighten United States trade control on African elephant ivory to address poaching crisis.
lead_paragraph: The Fish and Wildlife Service takes issue with an Op-Ed article, “The Wrong Way to Protect Elephants.”
